description:
When she was a child, Kanata was rescued by a female soldier while lost in an abandoned building.  The soldier was carrying a shiny gold trumpet. "If I become a soldier, I can play the trumpet!" With this slight misunderstanding in her mind, Kanata joins the army to become a trumpeter. The newly-minted Private Kanata is deployed to the small 1121st Platoon, in the town of Seize.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sound That Fills the Air: The City of Dawn
